data.text:
Check out the Sulekha listings and find the best O general AC dealers near you. Our reputed and authorized O general AC dealers from the ranks deliver first-grade cooling solutions and customer services catered to home/ residence or office/commercial needs. Choose from the best O general AC dealers and buy an effective air conditioning system inclusive of a 1-year warranty, free installation, and periodic services at an affordable package. Talk to an AC expert today and get a quote at Sulekha.

O General is an established Indian air conditioning brand that primarily focuses on eco-friendliness and is one of the sought-after brands for cost-efficiency. O General offers myriad residential and commercial AC models like windows and split-air conditioners for users to browse. With over five manufacturing and 3000+ outlets across the country, the company offers end-to-end solutions to win customers’ loyalty and trust. O General is an ideal air-cooling solution for users keen to purchase ACs with noise trimming levels with rapid cooling technology. The brand is highly successful for its all-encompassing polished product engineering and technical research

Types of O General AC

O General is one of the promising AC brands in India that delivers economic air conditioning solutions, coming with different variants and models catering to specific client requirements. Each air conditioner exhibits distinctive technology installed to power up cooling efficiency, irrespective of the length and width of space and temperature. The following list of O General AC models depicts the brand’s innovative technology platform.

O General 1.5 Ton 3-Star Split AC

One of the best models pioneered inverter technology and smart AC feature, enabling users to switch the AC remotely through smartphones and applications. The AC is equipped with several features like an anti-bacterial, dust particle filter, and active carbon filter for a dust-free cooling experience and is coiled with a copper condenser, which prevents electrical hazards. There are additional cooling features, namely precision cooling, decimal setting, and turbo cooling for small rooms.

O General 0.5 Ton 3-Star Window AC

With a rotary compressor and copper condenser, this window AC produces a noise level of 48db, which is comparatively lower than other window ACs in the past. Enabled with moisture removal, an anti-bacterial filter, and dehumidification technology, this AC emphasizes eco-friendly functions to support a global cause.

Cost of O General AC

The average O General AC cost substantiates its brand promise, but the range depends on various factors, such as the required AC ton to cover the whole area of a room and the authorized dealer’s price. Here is the approximate price for O General split and window air conditioner.

O General 1.5 Ton 3 Star Split AC (FS318AATU)

The O General split AC (FS318AATU) hit the air conditioning market in 2021 and is known for its rapid cooling technology at an efficient price. The AC is available in India at a price ranging between ₹35,000 to ₹39,000.

O General 0.5 Ton 3-Star Window AC (3WAE081YDF)

The O General window AC (3WAE081YDF) is one of the low-noise ACs available in the market, and such features have ignited the average price of the product. The AC is available in India at a price ranging from ₹16,000 to ₹19,000. However, the price depends on the quote from the authorized O General dealer.

Capacity of O General AC

O General offers both the conventional AC variants, split AC and the window AC. The capacity of both the model variants is given below

Split AC

Split Ac is an irreplaceable asset in the modern era, considering the shift of residential and commercial structures favoring widespread cooling solutions. The capacity of an average split air conditioning system ranges from 1 ton to 5 tons. However, In O General, the unit size is limited to 3 Ton.

985 sq. ft – 1 ton approx

1.100 sq. ft – 2 tons approx.

1,800 sq. ft – 2.5 tons approx.

2,100 sq. ft – 3.5 tons approx.

Window AC

Out-fashioned yet operational for users. Window Ac is still efficient for smaller rooms for air circulations.

300 sq. ft – 0.5 ton approx.

600 sq. ft – 1 ton approx.
